name: a2b (choipaper)
description:
a2b (a to b)

It is simple puzzle game.

The goal is you go from a(red) to b(purple).

You can move within given steps and pick random boxes if you want.

Don't forget this is OUT OF CONTROL theme based game.

*p.s. It's my first time joining game jam, so I could not manage time well which means game has very few levels :(

Have a fun!
